title: Let's Play RWBY: Grimm Eclipse - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Tim takes a quick look at the RWBY video game.

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Each and every day, Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Colin Moriarty get together to talk videogames. 

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys and this is Kinda Funny Games today we're playing RWBY: Grimm Eclipse this is crazy I'm playing a video game based off of a Rooster Teeth show never thought I'd see the day I haven't played this is going to be my first time playing oh it's an online game wait new game what join existing game let's go quick game I thought this was a one player single player game but I guess it's not all right so this is based on RWBY the anime by Rooster Teeth maybe one day we'll see a video game based on Red vs Blue obviously I got to play with my girl Weiss the door is open I'm in character right now oh here I am this is crazy oh there's another Weiss it's me oh hello hello all right got my jump there's no double jump though oh **** Yang there's so many Weisses can I go in there no can't go in there all right so this started as a fan game and then Rooster Teeth actually brought the dudes that were making it in to make it a real thing looks like we found Ruby huh I

there no can't go in there all right so this this started at a as a a fan game and then Rooster Teeth actually brought the dudes that were making it in to make it a real thing looks like we found Ruby huh I don't really know too much about this I wonder if that if it's the actual voice from the girls you'd think it is but that didn't sound like Arryn the voice of Blake oh okay I died huh so those are the Grimm that are attacking the bad guys in this series oh that's that that sounded like Carla all right so that's like a Dodge Pierce Nova what's Nova a jump interesting okay oh oh oh get it get it the look of this game is very impressive it's crazy how much it looks like the actual show itself M system is pretty simple I'm shocked I actually thought this was a was more of just like a campaign I do know it it takes place in between season or volumes one and two of the series um they're on season 3 right now I only saw I think they're on episode four I've only seen the first two what's going on over

it takes place in between season or volumes one and two of the series um they're on season 3 right now i only saw i think they're on episode four i've only seen the first two what's going on over here see what else we got going on no controls it's fine actually what the hell let's see what's going on here right so an upgrade dod and sprint move camera jump attack use special skills okay got it oh wow there's a lot going on here using all my points oh i probably should have done i'm save some of that that was definitely jason david frank's voice so maybe they are using the voices my people left me lock on oh **** oh dodge i just love that there's so many wiseguys right now yeah oh oh run run rice run all right we go over there help out you girls yeah boy oh can't win them off i want to hear the voices more after this battle i'm going to change the settings of that oh more to come get it oh damn it i keep using this one to dodge revive me Weiss thank you y'all got no i like this quick make

Thank you Yang, you are the homie. Oh my God. All right, don't revive me, just go kill that damn thing. It's these green **** that I need to get away from. Oh, we're not doing too good. Keep dying. All right, no be careful. How come they don't die in one hit? More thing... oh my God, where's that fuel at? Oh, this is so close. Oh well, there you have it, folks. I blame myself entirely. Ladies and gentlemen, this has been Ruby Grim Eclipse - not a great showing of it, mind you, but uh, it's it's cool. I definitely like it. It's definitely authentic to the show and stuff. Um, shout out to all my friends over there at Rooster Teeth, obviously. Specifically, the RWBY girls: Lindsay Jones, Cara Rieger (not Barber), Dunan (no last name mentioned), Aaron, Zack, Little Miss A to Z as I like to call her - she plays Blake. Go say hi on Twitter; I don't know what her Twitter handle is.
